# allowsMagnification

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether magnify gestures change the web view’s magnification.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsMagnification: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. You can set the `magnification` property even if `allowsMagnification` is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Scaling content

- **pageZoom**: The scale factor by which the web view scales content relative to its bounds.
- **magnification**: The factor by which the page content is currently scaled.
- **setMagnification(_:centeredAt:)**: Scales the page content and centers the result on the specified point.
